news.title: Restaurant dining linked to coronavirus: Study
news.summary: Among adults tested for the coronavirus at 11 U.S. healthcare facilities in July, those who were infected were about twice as likely to have dined at a restaurant in the previous 14 days, according to a US study.

news.title: Restaurant dining linked to coronavirus in US: Study
news.summary: According to a United States study, among adults tested for the coronavirus at 11 US healthcare facilities in July, those who were infected were about twice as likely to have dined at a restaurant in the previous 14 days.

news.title: Studies: Restaurant dining linked to COVID-19; virus symptoms usually last months
news.summary: Scientists and governments across the world are scrambling to find a cure for the novel coronavirus amid the World Health Organisation's appeal to contribute resources that can expedite products which may help stem the COVID-19 pandemic.
